name: Stoutland
author: Mizue
flavor_text: It pays no mind to the cold, thanks to its long warm coat. Stoutland in Alola look a little uncomfortable.

abilities.name: Arf Arf Bark
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may discard an Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon. If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent’s attack, you may discard an Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
